column4: Hi folks it is me again. I would like to run(use) skype, however, so some reason (when I try to run) it says 'P2P connect failed", What I have fail to do? what should I do?
maybe you need to open port(s) on your router?
I don't have router. I have just modem which it is connecting to comcast Internet.
dialup? you're out there in the boons aren't you. maybe you have a software firewall blocking your ports, otherwise no idea really - gluck :)
